channel.title: Help with spec maxes
channel.description: ok i want people who work hard for a weapon to have a awesome spec weapon for pvp so could someone please help me find a way to make a spec like never hit lower than a certain amount, if u could help it would be greatly appreciated everytime i post help topics on mopar they never get answered :S
